name: TeaRadiobyDilmah
0:
”Alexa, open tea radio”
”Alexa, start tea radio”
”Alexa, ask tea radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tea radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Tea Radio by Dilmah, your one-stop shop for a truly immersive listening experience. We're more than just tunes; we're a celebration of the rich heritage of Ceylon tea, all wrapped up in the nostalgic charm of retro music.

At Tea Radio by Dilmah, we believe there's something truly special about the music that shaped earlier decades. That's why we curate a playlist bursting with 80s, 90s, and early 2000s hits guaranteed to get your head bopping and your memories flowing.
Think classic jams, tea talk, and a whole lotta FUN! We're talkin' about a TOTAL PACKAGE! So, grab your favourite cuppa and let's dive into the world of DILMAH TEA RADIO!
Leading the charge is the ever-evolving Amrit Fernando. Our Dilmah 3rd-gen tea grower with a passion for retro music that rivals even the most seasoned audiophiles. Of course, Amrit isn't flying solo. Dilhan Fernando, a seasoned tea expert and Dilmah Chairman/ CEO lends his wisdom and expertise to guide you through the world of Dilmah teas. Together, they bridge the gap between generations, proving that a love for good music and a great cup of tea is truly timeless.
 
Tune in, explore, and discover the perfect infusion of music and tea inspiration, only on Tea Radio by Dilmah!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
